site_name: Land Adjacent To Manhattan Business Park West GateEalingW5 1UP
description: Application for a Non-Material Change (Section 21, Schedule 17 of the High Speed Rail (London-West Midlands) Act 2017)  seeking to allow changes to the entrance gate, green roof, fan room footprint, roof parapet handrail, design of headhouse building, earthworks and hard landscape levels in relation to approval reference 205148HS2 dated 25/03/2021 for Development authorised by the High Speed Rail (London-West Midlands) Act 2017 relating to the Westgate vent shaft headhouse and compound, including building works, road vehicle parking, earthworks, fencing/walls and artificial lighting equipment
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
